languages.text: {n}Возможно, ксенос и впрямь настолько могущественен, что может дробить чужую душу на куски и менять ее. Если так, то от всякого, кто побывал в его плену, стоит держаться подальше. Он мог исказить их непредсказуемым образом.{/n}

{n}It is possible that the xenos is indeed so powerful as to be able to dissect and alter a person's soul. If so, anyone who has spent time as his captive should be avoided. There is no telling to what extent he can twist someone's very being.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Возможно, ксенос и впрямь настолько могущественен, что может дробить чужую душу на куски и менять ее. Если так, то от всякого, кто побывал в его плену, стоит держаться подальше. Он мог исказить их непредсказуемым образом.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es posible que los xenos sean lo bastante fuertes como para diseccionar y alterar la mente de una persona. De ser así, conviene evitar a quien haya pasado un tiempo con ellos. Es un misterio hasta dónde pueden cambiar la esencia misma de alguien.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is possible that the xenos is indeed so powerful as to be able to dissect and alter a person's soul. If so, anyone who has spent time as his captive should be avoided. There is no telling to what extent he can twist someone's very being.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es posible que los xenos sean lo bastante fuertes como para diseccionar y alterar la mente de una persona. De ser así, conviene evitar a quien haya pasado un tiempo con ellos. Es un misterio hasta dónde pueden cambiar la esencia misma de alguien.{/n}

languages.text: {n}異種族は確かに、人の魂をバラバラにして変えてしまうほど能力が高い可能性はある。もしそれができるなら、奴に囚われたことがある者には接触しない方がいい。奴がどこまで人というものを歪めることができるのか分からないのだから。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is possible that the xenos is indeed so powerful as to be able to dissect and alter a person's soul. If so, anyone who has spent time as his captive should be avoided. There is no telling to what extent he can twist someone's very being.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族は確かに、人の魂をバラバラにして変えてしまうほど能力が高い可能性はある。もしそれができるなら、奴に囚われたことがある者には接触しない方がいい。奴がどこまで人というものを歪めることができるのか分からないのだから。{/n}

languages.text: {n}或许那些异形确实拥有强大的力量，足以抽取、扭曲人类的灵魂。如果真的是这样，那所有遭到血伶人俘虏的人都应该被远远避开，毕竟没人知道血伶人究竟能把他人的心智扭曲到什么程度。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is possible that the xenos is indeed so powerful as to be able to dissect and alter a person's soul. If so, anyone who has spent time as his captive should be avoided. There is no telling to what extent he can twist someone's very being.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}或许那些异形确实拥有强大的力量，足以抽取、扭曲人类的灵魂。如果真的是这样，那所有遭到血伶人俘虏的人都应该被远远避开，毕竟没人知道血伶人究竟能把他人的心智扭曲到什么程度。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Möglicherweise ist der Xenos tatsächlich so mächtig, dass er die Seele einer Person manipulieren kann. Sollte dem so sein, sollest du Leute meiden, die in seiner Gewalt waren. Niemand weiß, in welchem Ausmaß er das Wesen einer Person verändern kann.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is possible that the xenos is indeed so powerful as to be able to dissect and alter a person's soul. If so, anyone who has spent time as his captive should be avoided. There is no telling to what extent he can twist someone's very being.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Möglicherweise ist der Xenos tatsächlich so mächtig, dass er die Seele einer Person manipulieren kann. Sollte dem so sein, sollest du Leute meiden, die in seiner Gewalt waren. Niemand weiß, in welchem Ausmaß er das Wesen einer Person verändern kann.

languages.text: {n}Il est bien possible que le xénos soit assez puissant pour disséquer et altérer l'âme de ses victimes, auquel cas il convient d'éviter soigneusement tous ceux qui ont séjourné dans ses geôles. Nul ne sait dans quelle mesure il est capable de pervertir l'essence même de ses infortunés cobayes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is possible that the xenos is indeed so powerful as to be able to dissect and alter a person's soul. If so, anyone who has spent time as his captive should be avoided. There is no telling to what extent he can twist someone's very being.{/n}

Nul ne sait dans quelle mesure il est capable de pervertir l'essence même de ses infortunés cobayes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zenonun gerçekten de bir insanın ruhunu parçalayıp değiştirebilecek kadar güçlü olması mümkün. Dolayısıyla bir süre onun tutsağı olmuş birinden uzak durulmalı. Kişinin benliğini ne derece eğip bükebileceğini tahmin etmek mümkün değil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is possible that the xenos is indeed so powerful as to be able to dissect and alter a person's soul. If so, anyone who has spent time as his captive should be avoided. There is no telling to what extent he can twist someone's very being.{/n}
